open.title: Vumatel Degraded Services | National
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting clients on their network, affected clients will experience degraded speeds. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Vumatel Villages clients in San Monroe, affected clients will experience limited or no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
